column2: Greenpro Capital Corp. engages in the provision of business solution services to small and medium-size enterprises. The company employs 70 full-time employees The firm operates and provides a range of business solution services to small and medium-size businesses located in Asia, with an initial focus on Hong Kong, China and Malaysia. Its segments include Service business, Real estate business and Corporate. The Service business segment is engaged in the provision of business solution services. The Real estate business segment is engaged in leasing and trading of commercial real estate properties in Hong Kong and Malaysia. Its range of services includes cross-border business solutions, record management services, and accounting outsourcing services. Its cross border business services include tax planning, trust and wealth management, cross border listing advisory services and transaction services. The company provides assistance to set up bank accounts with banks in Hong Kong to facilitate clients' banking operations.
Room 1701-1703 17F The Metropolis Tower, 10 Metropolis Drive
